title: LF FLEX 5V5
body:
Hello.

I am looking for a team to  combine their efforts and all their frustration of Solo Queue into an organised environment where concentration, dedication and learning are priority. We will be using discord, for communication . 
We do follow rules, to not waste other players time, especially those who actually wish to climb. While we do have rules, we take things breezy and simply enjoy League of Legends for what it is, a GAME...... No TOXIC people!


Game Times (AEST)

Still to be figured out, between group.


Voice Communication: Discord
Playing Environment; Semi-Serious
Dedication required; 3 Nights, 2 games each night 
Division Restriction; Silver 4 or Above.
Attitude requirement; You must be prepared to sit down and practice, through wins and through losses.

We will be aiming high for Platinum Season 7

add me in game thenotorioussvig :)
